title: Organic & Native Plant Landscaping
intro: Layered planting schemes using native species, soil amendments, and organic maintenance plans that thrive without chemicals.

avgCost.notes: Includes soil prep, planting, mulch, and seasonal follow-up visits.

highlights: Locally sourced natives and adaptive species
Organic fertilizers and integrated pest management
Seasonal refresh plans and pollinator habitat design

faqs.a: Yes. Our organic care teams handle pruning, soil health, and seasonal color updates to keep native landscapes thriving.
